imdb.plot outline: In this first episode of the series "The Conquest of Mexico", two empires divided by an ocean, with a parallel vision of the world, are found in a moment of fusion and clash: the Spanish Empire, coming out from the Reconquista ("reconquest"), with a christian philosophy and with a declining crown thirsty of wealth, and the Aztec Empire, -ruled by Moctezuma, feared and respected by foreigners-, who had extended over a vast territory of discontented and divided nations.
imdb.title: La Conquista, capítulo I. El drama y sus protagonistas
plot: In this first episode of the series "The Conquest of Mexico", two empires divided by an ocean, with a parallel vision of the world, are found in a moment of fusion and clash: the Spanish Empire, coming out from the Reconquista ("reconquest"), with a christian philosophy and with a declining crown thirsty of wealth, and the Aztec Empire, -ruled by Moctezuma, feared and respected by foreigners-, who had extended over a vast territory of discontented and divided nations.::Clío TV
